channel.title: gem on Eric Garcia
channel.description: Recent content in gem on Eric Garcia

item.title: Jekyll
item.description: source Specifying a :path attribute will install the gem from that path on your local machine. gem "<gem-name>", :path => "<full-local-path>" Alternately, specifying a :git attribute will install the gem from a remote git repository. "git://github.com/<github-username>/<github-repo>.git" # ...or at a specific SHA-1 ref gem "<gem-name>", :git => "git://github.com/<github-username>/<github-repo>.git", :ref => "bf648a070c" # ...or branch gem "<gem-name>", :git => "git://github.com/<github-username>/<github-repo>.git", :branch => "jruby" # ...or tag gem "<gem-name>", :git => "git://github.
